properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 6 at 10:47AM MST until February 7 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Grand Junction CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 18 inches
with locally higher amounts above 9000 feet. Winds gusting as
high as 50 mph.

* WHERE...Northwest San Juan Mountains.

* WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy
blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty
winds could bring down tree branches. A detailed map of the
snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST FRIDAY
